ygData.subject: Re: Runes in stores
ygData.msgSnippet: Players probably sold those runes to the shopkeepers.  Then the shopkeeper jacks up the price big time to sell it out.  The player that sold it to the
ygData.messageBody:
Players probably sold those runes to the shopkeepers. Then the shopkeeper
jacks up the price big time to sell it out. The player that sold it to the
shopkeeper only got 2pp or so i think, so if you want to buy runes advertise
on the auction channel and i am sure you can get them for a lot cheaper.

-Solric

-----Original Message-----
From: Donald Taber [mailto:dtaber@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 1:37 PM
To: EverQuest Mailing List
Subject: [eq_wizards] Runes in stores


From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>

On a couple occasions I have seen runes for sale in stores for about 12
plat. This seems high, but since they are hard to find, should I be
picking them up? I have a reasonable amount of plat (10-20), but never
enough where 12 is cheap.

Soren
Wizard Level 14
